attributes.action: Discuss with the incumbent Mayor of London, at their next meeting,  the idea of replacing the voice of the announcer on London Underground tubes with the voice of  Sir David Attenborough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So now Life in Cold Blood is over, and the great man has hung up his broadcasting boots for good, what better tribute than to replace the starchy, boring voice on the London Underground with the silky, enthusiastic utterances of Sir David Attenborough.

Ever since we were tiny, Sir David's trademark "THIS... is a <creature>" has had us pricking up our ears for the fascinating facts to follow. 

Surely, a national institution such as he is deserves such immortalisation. People, pledge your support below.

And, if you need convincing, take a moment and just imagine Sir David intoning the following... "THIS... is Bank. Change hyer for the Northern, District and Circle lines... and the Waterloo and City Line".

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
